executable.title: NAMIC Loadable Module Code Generator
executable.description: Generates source and header files that enable a module to be loaded dynamically at Slicer3 runtime
executable.acknowledgements: This implementation based on Bill Lorensen's GenerateCLP utility.

file.name: InputTxt
file.label: Input Text
file.description: Text file containing key:value description of module

file.name: OutputHeader
file.label: Output Header
file.description: C++ header to declare loadable module entry points

file.name: OutputCxx
file.label: Output C++
file.description: C++ source to implement entry points required to dynamically load the module
